MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH4 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Curzon Park North and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further resources required to repair a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:40PM on 26th Decemeber 2020.
